title: A Tour of the Bicycle Heaven Museum in Pittsburgh
content:
Explore the ultimate cycling paradise at the Bicycle Heaven Museum and Bike Shop! In this video, Timber Adventures takes us on a thrilling journey to a place where bicycle enthusiasts’ dreams come true. Whether you’re a seasoned cyclist or just a beginner, this video is sure to inspire your next adventure. So, get ready to pedal your way to bicycle heaven on earth…

A massive thanks to Craig Morrow of Bicycle Heaven for bringing this amazing place to life. Two floors stacked floor to ceiling with bicycles from the 1800s, pennyfarthings, BMX, mountain bikes, classic lightweight road bikes, you name it, it’s there.

The rare bikes, and the rare components and accessories, the thrill of actually seeing and touching some of these bicycles is unreal.

Check it out, Bicycle Heaven Museum and Bike Shop in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. It has all the parking you could possibly want. A donation gets you a tour of the facility and probably meet the man himself, Craig.

Bicycle Heaven Museum found at:

RJ Casey industrial Park
1800 Preble Ave.
Pittsburgh, PA 15233 ￼
